item.title: 1-Day Camp; Apr 18, 2025 | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Join us for an exhilarating exploration of robotics, coding, chess, and math. Teamwork and collaboration are at the heart of our camp experience. Students will have the opportunity to work together, share ideas, and solve challenges. Through hands-on activities and group projects, students will develop critical thinking skills and learn the importance of effective communication.

item.title: Intro to 3D Printing | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Class 1: Introduction to 3D Printing What is 3D printing and what is it used for? 3D printing is a process of creating three-dimensional objects from a digital file. It is used in various fields such as manufacturing, medicine, and education. <h3>How to use a 3D printer?</h3> <p>Using a 3D printer involves preparing the design file, setting up the printer, and monitoring the print process.</p> <h3>Where to find STL files</h3> <p>STL files can be found on websites like Thingiverse, MyMiniFactory, and Cults3D.

item.title: Intro to C# for Unity | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: This class is perfect for students who are interested in developing programming skills for game development. This course introduces video game development using C# and the Unity game engine on Windows. C# is highlighted for its suitability for beginners and professional development, while Unity is popular among indie developers, with widespread adoption. The course assumes no prior programming experience, starting from basics and progressing to small game development. It covers core programming concepts applicable to many languages, with a focus on game development.

item.title: Intro to Roblox Studio | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: This class is perfect for students who are new to creating games in Roblox. We will teach you how to create your first Roblox experience using Roblox Studio. You will use a Baseplate template and a high-quality catapult asset pack to build and organize a data model, customize 3D objects, and organize scripts for proper simulation. We will guide you through testing, publishing, and managing your experience for a global audience, using project templates and asset packs from the Creator Store to simplify the process.
